premium_info_desc: PLZ_TRANSLATE Let your children pay, so they learn good money habits. The Gimi Card is included.
premium_info_faq_answer_1: Gimi Master ist ein Abonnement, welches die Gimi App auf richtiges Geld upgradet. Es beinhaltet eine Prepaid-Mastercard entworfen f√ºr Kinder und ein Konto zum Geldsparen.
premium_info_faq_question_2: Wo kann ich die Karte verwenden?
premium_info_faq_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card can be used online, in stores and abroad. Subscribing supporter decides if they want to allow online shopping and ATM withdrawals!
premium_info_faq_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters add their own card in the Gimi App, or register Swish. They can top-up the Gimi Card directly in the app.
premium_info_faq_question_4: Ist mein Kind bereit f√ºr eine Karte?
premium_info_faq_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is designed to give children support from parents and the Gimi app. There's no age limit on the card, but it's popular from 9 years!
premium_info_faq_question_5: Was ist das besondere an dieser Karte?
premium_info_faq_answer_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is more than a card, it also teaches your children smart money habits. The card is connected to both your child‚Äôs educational Gimi App and your parent app. We don‚Äôt sell your data or advertise in the app, which is why we offer a paid version for users who want to support our mission.
premium_info_faq_answer_6: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi uses 2-factor authentication to keep your money safe. We use a phone number instead of BankID. With the phone number, your child will set up an app passcode.
premium_info_faq_question_7: PLZ_TRANSLATE How does promo codes work?
premium_info_faq_answer_7: PLZ_TRANSLATE A promo code will give you Gimi Master a certain number of months for free. After the free months, you will be charged according to your chosen subscription model.
